name: A LAKE IN AMERICA
description:
• Game design, art & scripting by Joel Auterson
  • Poem by Antosh Wojcik
  • Music by /weirdtoday

A LAKE IN AMERICA is a game-poem written in the throes of water-based hypochondria. It’s a small adventure game, with branching narrative pathways. Play it a couple of times. Drink water. Try not to overthink what’s in the water.

This game-poem is playable on mobile, but we recommend playing it on a computer (with headphones) as not all mobile browsers support background music.

It is the first production by Rare Mammals. Rare Mammals is a collective producing electric goop that combines game design and poetry to push the ideas of what can be done in both forms. We’re here to have fun and make weird things. 

Content warning: Contains references to suicide & health anxiety.
